sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INSR5300 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , UMYT_INSR_CLUT_YR , PRMM_IPOS_DIV_CD , UMYT_INSR_AQTN_DT , UMYT_INSR_LSS_DT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #emymtSeilNum# , #umytInsrClutYr# , #prmmIposDivCd# , #umytInsrAqtnDt# , #umytInsrLssDt# , #umytInsrPayTotAmnt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INSR5300 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# , UMYT_INSR_CLUT_YR=#umytInsrClutYr# , PRMM_IPOS_DIV_CD=#prmmIposDivCd# , UMYT_INSR_AQTN_DT=#umytInsrAqtnDt# , UMYT_INSR_LSS_DT=#umytInsrLssDt# , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT=#umytInsrPayTotAmnt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND UMYT_INSR_CLUT_YR=#umytInsrClutYr#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM INSR5300 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND UMYT_INSR_CLUT_YR=#umytInsrClutYr#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , UMYT_INSR_CLUT_YR , PRMM_IPOS_DIV_CD , UMYT_INSR_AQTN_DT , UMYT_INSR_LSS_DT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR5300 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND UMYT_INSR_CLUT_YR=#umytInsrClutYr#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , UMYT_INSR_CLUT_YR , PRMM_IPOS_DIV_CD , UMYT_INSR_AQTN_DT , UMYT_INSR_LSS_DT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR5300 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM DESC , UMYT_INSR_CLUT_YR DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM INSR5300 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
